24.4. Tuned CNN Model 509
Figure 24.2: Box and whisker plot of 1D CNN with and without standardization.
24.4.2 Number of Filters
Now that we have an experimental framework, we can explore varying other hyperparameters
of the model. An important hyperparameter for the CNN is the number of ﬁlter maps. We can
experiment with a range of diﬀerent values, from less to many more than the 64 used in the
ﬁrst model that we developed. Speciﬁcally, we will try the following numbers of feature maps:
